alert.note: Alert for Gove; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 9:03PM CDT until June 16 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN THOMAS...SOUTHWESTERN SHERIDAN AND NORTHWESTERN GOVE COUNTIES... At 903 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grinnell, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Grainfield around 940 PM CDT. Park around 1000 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Angelus. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 80 and 98. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
